ItemDesc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Crude material used for enhancement.
ItemBGDesc: It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion. A heavy blow has caused this heart to stop beating and lose its luster. "Preliminary tests indicate it's some kind of hybrid: One half is primordial, and the other half is something very similar to Stellarons." — Department of Biology, Sarah Castro

ItemComefrom.Desc: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe
